block_template.label: Module Template
block_template.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: ves/productlist/widget/carousel.phtml Empty for default

common_template.label: Custom Common Items Template
common_template.description:
Input custom common template file path which will show list product items. The common template file was stored in the folder design/frontend/../../template/common/list/.
For example: vesproductlist_item.phtml or item.phtml
Empty for default.

limit.label: Limit Products
limit.description: Input number products will show. Empty to show all

rule_id.label: Rule Id
rule_id.description: Select a product list rule to get product from the rule.

source_type.description: Select products data source from which will override source type in product list - rule.

Yes true
No false
70 true "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links.

slider_height.label: Slide Height
slider_height.description: Input number to make height of swiper slide in px. For example: 500

speed.label: Speed
speed.comment: Duration of transition between slides (in ms)

items_per_page.label: Number Products Show Per Page
items_per_page.description: Input number value of products which show per page of carousel. If number per page > number column on page it will show grid products. For example: 4

mobile_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones)

tablet_small_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones to Small tablets)

tablet_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones to tablets)

portrait_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Portrait tablets)
portrait_items.description: Show number items when screen size between 979px and 769px

large_items.label: Number Columns On Page (Large display)
large_items.description: Show number items when screen size 1200px and up
